channel.title: Admin on ENDARI
channel.description: Recent content in Admin on ENDARI

item.title: Problems of a Perfectionist
item.description: Chapter One The trap of perfection After over 30 years of walking the earth believing the problem was with everything else but me, I just recently found out most of the goal I never achieved were the direct result of a very big lie I’ve bin telling myself all my life, “Perfection is the goal!”. Looking back now, I even have a list of rules, that the first command of which reads like this: “Do it, only if you can do it perfectly”, and oh boy!

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Testing Let’s begin by a subtitle! And some more subheading text This is a paragraph of text, with important and semi important words. do I need to wrap my text with enters, or it will be aligned as justified? who knows! now lets write some lists and code blocks and quotes: Some list Things to do: read the documentation. find a good subject to write about write the blog polish and publish And now some code: def averager(*args: int) -> float: return sum(args) / len(args) A picture: Emoji Test :grinning_face:ðŸ™‚ :winking_face_with_tongue: ::grinning_face::ðŸ™‚
